title: Media Belanda Sebut John Heitinga Tolak Tawaran PSSI Jadi Pelatih Timnas Indonesia
snippet: Dalam laporan yang sama, disebutkan bahwa Heitinga, yang merupakan asisten Arne Slot di Liverpool pada musim 2024-2025, tidak bersedia untuk melatih Timnas Indonesia saat ini.

title: John Heitinga - Wikipedia
snippet: On 6 November 2025, just 5 months after being announced as head coach of Ajax, Heitinga was dismissed following the club's 3–0 home defeat to Turkish side Galatasaray in the Champions League, which saw them sit bottom of the league phase table, failing to secure a point in their 4 matches.

title: John Heitinga heeft nieuwe klus als trainer voor het uitkiezen | FootballTransfers.com
snippet: Bijgewerkt: 9 dec. 2025 11:59 CET ... John Heitinga begon het seizoen als hoofdtrainer van Ajax. Al vrij snel moest hij daar weer vertrekken. Sindsdien zit de oefenmeester zonder werk.

title: Ajax to sack manager John Heitinga less than six months after Liverpool exit - BBC Sport
snippet: Heitinga replaced Francesco Farioli as Ajax manager in May · ByAlex Brotherton · BBC Sport journalist · Published · 6 November 2025 · Ajax have announced they will sack manager John Heitinga less than six months after he joined the club ...

title: John Heitinga appointed head coach of Ajax
snippet: Ajax has reached an agreement with John Heitinga regarding the coach’s move to Amsterdam. Heitinga is signing a contract with Ajax as head coach until June 30, 2027. Marcel Keizer will be his assistant and is signing a contract of the same ...
